Ensure student journalism survives PERIOD Donate today PERIOD

By  Lucy Atkinson Assistant Opinion EditorApril  

DeKALBHuskie Hub the online platform for student organizations on campus is accessible as an app PERIOD Student organizations can post notices about upcomingevents communicate with their members and much more PERIOD However while many students find the Hub to be a useful idea they were previously unaware of its existence

Do you know what Huskie Hub is
 Answer  I have no idea what that is. if you were in a student organization would you consider using it

Answer  Yeah its like a social media for your organization Yeah well get it. do you know what Huskie Hub is
 Answer  I didnt. if you were in a student organization would you consider using it

Answer  Yeah I would definitely get it considering I am in some orgs. are you currently in any student organizations

Answer  Im in Good Girls and Im a part of CAB. do you know what Huskie Hub is
 Answer  I do not. if you were in a student organization would you consider using it

Answer  I would PERIOD Its easier than like discord or something I think its great that someone made an app so its not like just bouncing around like in a giant Snapchat chat because Ive had to do that before for school PERIOD Or like a discord thats an absolute nightmare to manage because at least its like all schoolrelated PERIOD So thats nice. do you know what Huskie Hub is
 Answer  No. if you were in a student organization would you consider using it

Answer  Yeah because you know where all the stuff is at PERIOD Students know where all the events is at. are you currently in any student organizations

Answer  YeahIm in ASSA The African Student Association and Im in NSBE the National Society for Black Engineers. do you know what Huskie Hub is
 Answer  No. if you were in a student organization would you consider using it

Answer  Definitely PERIOD YeahYeah because I feel like all the information would be there and like the timing and everything PERIOD They would just be intheknow everything for all the events PERIOD So thats why. are you currently in any student organizations

Answer  I am in Ohana. do you know what Huskie Hub is
 Answer  No. if you were in a student organization would you consider using it

Answer  Yeah if I was in oneI dont know PERIOD I didnt know about it so it seems like its useful PERIOD It seems like theres a lot of stuff on there. are you currently in any student organizations

Answer  No not right now. this poll has ended PERIOD

Do you use Huskie Hub
